## ElementHandle.focus() method

Calls [focus](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/focus) on the element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
focus(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
